other_title: アニメで分かる心療内科 (Japanese)
plot: The public is about to get a dose of somewhat fictive reality. The Yuu mental clinic are opening their doors and are launching an info show about psychosomatic deceases and to help guide the unknowing masses through these disabilities are staff members Shinnai Ryo and Kangoshi Asuna, respected psychologist and clinical nurse.
ending_theme: "Karappo Capsule" (からっぽカプセル; Empty Capsule) by Maaya Uchida
